```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
```

```{r}
title_vec <- c()

for (i in 1:10) {
url <- paste("https://www.metacritic.com/browse/games/score/metascore/all/psvita/filtered?page=", i, sep = "")

metacritic_html <- read_html(url)

title_vec <-
  metacritic_html %>% 
  html_nodes(".title h3") %>% 
  html_text()

}

games_df <- tibble(title = title_vec)
```
